text: Emma Best is an American reporter and whistleblower. They worked with WikiLeaks and activist Julian Assange to inform about the Freedom of Information Act (FOIA). During the Trump administration, Best reported on the FBI files of President Donald Trump, Roger Stone, and a company owned by the Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin. Best has been called a former hacker and journalist. == References == == Other websites == * Distributed Denial of Secrets *Mastodon *Twitter * Website Category:Digital archivists Category:People from Boston Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:American activists Category:LGBT journalists Category:Non-binary people Category:Queer people Category:2022 Russian invasion of Ukraine
title: Emma Best (journalist)
